channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 15:39 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements.
item.description: 🟢 15:39 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 15:37 WARNING!!! Threat of use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).
item.description: 🟠 15:37 WARNING!!! Threat of use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).#Zaporizhzhia_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of civilians – 0800339291
